The movie was just good,not the best .Romantic scenes were well shot in this movie. But too many songs in this movie irritated me a bit and director could have taken any other actress for this movie. Screenplay was good in first half but could have been better in Second half. Kissing scenes in this movie were really not required . But still watch this movie if you are in a relationship. But I'll not recommend this movie to everyone as The direction of the movie was not that strong and dialogue delivery of Actress didn't suit her. BGM was good.
My verdict:6.5/10 stars.
